footer.slogan: Linking Every Aspect, Managing Every Success

home.description: A tool for navigating and managing link shortening websites and links
home.heroLead: Efficiently Managing and Directing Links to Shortened Web Pages, Planning, and Adjusting Traffic Volume
home.toolDescription1: With our smart link management tool, you can easily create, edit, and delete links on your website. Ensure that links always function correctly and guide users to where they need to go.
home.toolDescription2: Enhance user experience by intelligently coordinating links. We allow you to direct users to the most important pages on your website, making it easy for them to find information and products.
home.toolDescription3: Content matters, and how you manage links also impacts SEO. We support you in optimizing keywords, header tags, and page content to ensure your website ranks well in search results.
home.toolDescription4: Don't miss out on any valuable insights. We provide link performance tracking tools, allowing you to know which links are clicked the most, which keywords are performing well, and even specific traffic sources.
home.whyChooseUsParagraph: We're not just a link management and coordination tool. We're your partner in building a better website. With extensive knowledge and expertise in SEO and link management, we're committed to bringing real value to your project.
home.reason5: Expertise in Link Management and SEO

dashboard.guildDescription4: Then scroll down to the bottom and press 'Submit' to save. Remember to set the view count as well as the priority order; it's all noted down. Make sure to read through.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.p-intro-1-1: In today's digital age, sharing links has become an integral part of online life.
disclaimer.p-intro-1-2: - the free link shortening tool has rapidly gained popularity for its ability to help users create concise and memorable links. However, we wish to declare a disclaimer of liability for
disclaimer.p-intro-1-3: and emphasize that the usage of this tool rests solely on the responsibility of the end user.
disclaimer.h2-1-1: User Responsibility when Using the Service at
disclaimer.p-1-1: We want to emphasize that the use of
disclaimer.p-1-2: is entirely the responsibility of the end user. We are not responsible for the content or actions of users when using this tool. Any actions that violate the law or cause harm to others will be legally accountable according to current laws and regulations.
disclaimer.p-2-1: When you leave our website, other websites may have different privacy policies and terms beyond our control. Please ensure to review the Privacy Policies of these websites as well as their 'Terms of Service' before engaging in any business activities or uploading any information.
disclaimer.p-3-1: provides technology to shorten website addresses. The shortened URL itself does not contain content but only redirects from the browser to an external website. All direct or indirect risks from using this website are borne by the user.
disclaimer.p-4-2: are links from other websites... all created and shared by our users.
disclaimer.p-4-3: is not the source of any content or sharing. We do not take responsibility or evaluate the content or accuracy of external websites or user-generated content.
disclaimer.p-5-1: does not send advertising emails, text messages, or newsletters in any form - so there's nothing to unsubscribe from. If you receive spam containing the domain
disclaimer.p-5-2: , unfortunately, that's the work of abusers! Please send us the link you received so that we can investigate the misuse of our service.
disclaimer.p-6-1: is just a link shortening tool and is not responsible for any losses or issues arising from its use. Users are entirely responsible for the use of this tool and must comply with relevant laws and regulations concerning link sharing and information security.
disclaimer.p-7-1: With this disclaimer, we want to remind everyone of the importance of self-protection online.
disclaimer.p-7-2: is a useful tool, but its use needs to be cautious and responsible.
disclaimer.h3-1-1: will not assume legal responsibility or compensation
disclaimer.p-8-1: also does not declare or guarantee and will not assume legal responsibility or obligation to ensure that you use the service
disclaimer.p-8-2: in compliance with any terms of

disclaimer.h3-2-1: does not guarantee meeting any business needs
disclaimer.p-10-1: does not guarantee that the results of using the service will meet your requirements or any business needs of yours or your users, individuals, or customers.
disclaimer.p-10-2: also does not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or that any interruptions will be promptly resolved.
disclaimer.p-11-2: disclaimer, they still commit to providing the best service possible and always strive to address any issues and incidents that arise. If you encounter any problems while using the service
disclaimer.p-11-3: , you should contact their customer support team for assistance.
disclaimer.p-12-1: Therefore, when using the link shortening service of
disclaimer.p-12-2: , understanding and accepting the disclaimer is essential. You should take responsibility for using this service and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and laws. Also, always stay in touch with
disclaimer.p-12-3: for support and answers to questions regarding their service.
disclaimer.p-13-1: does not accept, support, or allow any form of violent content on the platform. This includes, but is not limited to, images, videos, articles, or comments related to physical violence, sexual violence, aggressive behavior, fighting, or threats towards others.
disclaimer.p-14-1: We encourage users to report any violent content they encounter on
disclaimer.p-14-2: so that we can promptly address and take appropriate measures.
disclaimer.p-15-1: does not accept or allow explicit content, including explicit images, videos, articles, or comments of a pornographic, abusive, ethically offensive, or morally inappropriate nature according to our standards. We encourage people to use
disclaimer.p-15-2: with respect and not to distribute or share any explicit content on the platform.
disclaimer.p-16-1: prohibits all forms of gambling activities, including but not limited to placing bets with money, gambling, using gambling services, and creating or promoting content related to gambling. We do not facilitate gambling-related activities and encourage everyone to maintain a healthy and positive environment on
disclaimer.p-17-1: has the right to take appropriate measures against those who violate the regulations regarding violent content, explicit content, and gambling. These measures may include content removal, account suspension, or even reporting to legal authorities if violations involve unlawful activities.
disclaimer.p-18-1: is committed to maintaining a safe, positive environment and does not accept any form of violent content, explicit content, and gambling. We prioritize user interests and community values and will continue to promote a positive online experience on the platform.
disclaimer.p-19-1: Protecting personal information and ensuring network safety is the responsibility of each user. We recommend everyone to always follow these basic principles to safeguard themselves and others:
disclaimer.li-1-3: or any other link shortening tool, consider carefully before sharing sensitive personal information. Limit providing information such as home address, phone number, bank account details, and other personal information. This helps reduce the risk of falling into the hands of malicious individuals.
disclaimer.li-2-2: Before sharing a shortened link from
disclaimer.li-2-3: , double-check it to ensure it's not broken or altered. This helps avoid sharing inaccurate links or leading others to harmful websites.
disclaimer.li-3-1: Be cautious of unsolicited emails and messages
disclaimer.li-3-2: A common method for scamming users is using fake emails and messages. Be cautious of requests for personal information or clicking on links. Always verify the source email address and content of the message before taking any actions.
disclaimer.li-4-2: If you notice any suspicious activities related to
disclaimer.li-4-3: or shortened links, report them immediately to the support team or relevant authorities. Sharing information about untrustworthy activities helps other users avoid potential risks.
disclaimer.li-5-2: Always verify the source of the link before shortening. Ensure that the link being shortened is from a reliable source and not related to fraudulent activities or personal information theft.
disclaimer.li-6-2: Before clicking on a shortened link, hover over it to see the actual URL address. If there's any doubt about authenticity or security, avoid clicking and find another trustworthy source.
disclaimer.li-7-2: Ensure that you always update security software on your devices. This includes the operating system, web browser, and other security software. Keeping up with the latest versions helps protect against security vulnerabilities that hackers might exploit.
disclaimer.li-8-2: Install and use reliable antivirus software on your device. This program will help prevent and remove malware that could be transmitted through shortened links.
disclaimer.p-20-2: - the free link shortening tool. We hope everyone understands that using this tool requires caution and personal responsibility. By adhering to basic security principles and making informed decisions, each user can enjoy the benefits of

form.apiNameLable: API Name - API names must be different
form.apiUrlLable: API URL - in the format of:
form.maxViewLable: Max views per IP - when limit is reached, it will switch to the next API
form.priorityLable: Priority - APIs with higher priority will appear more frequently (priorities must be different)
form.descriptionLable: Description - Description of the shortening page
form.aliasRegex: Alias consists of letters and numbers, underscores (_), hyphens (-), and is under 200 characters.
form.passwordRegex: The password must be 8 to 32 characters long and include letters, numbers, and special characters {'@'}{'$'}{'!'}{'%'}{'*'}{'#'}{'?'}{'&'}{','}{'.'}{'?'}
form.confirmPasswordRegex: The password confirmation must be 8 to 32 characters long and include letters, numbers, and special characters {'@'}{'$'}{'!'}{'%'}{'*'}{'#'}{'?'}{'&'}{','}{'.'}{'?'}
form.usernameRegex: The username must be 3 to 20 characters long and can only contain letters, numbers, and special characters {'@'}{'$'}{'!'}{'%'}{'*'}{'#'}{'?'}{'&'}{','}{'.'}{'?'}
form.maxViewRegex: The maximum view count must be an integer
form.priorityRegex: The priority must be an integer

quick.title: Quick link
quick.note1: Everyone can use the simplest, fastest way to shorten links
quick.note2: Just copy the link below into the address bar into your web browser, change the last part to the target link to shorten, and press ENTER. We will redirect to your shortened link. Copy it anywhere you want and get paid.
